misc: Runs his mouth all the time
Constantly sees birds and other wildlife on the course
Might stand on the ball for quite some time in the tee box
biography: Juuso, a familiar face from Hyvinkään Golf, is a prominent figure in the Hector Trophée, known as much for his spirited banter as his performance on the course. With eight appearances in past Hector Trophée tournaments, Juuso brings a wealth of experience to the competition.

While the elusive Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have yet to find their way into Juuso's hands, his presence is always felt. Renowned for his talkative nature, Juuso is never one to shy away from sharing his opinions or engaging in light-hearted ribbing with fellow competitors. Beyond his vocal presence, Juuso possesses a keen eye for the natural world, frequently spotting birds and other wildlife during his rounds, adding a unique dimension to his play.

Spectators and fellow players alike have also noted Juuso's deliberate approach on the tee box, where he has been known to take his time and ensure every aspect of his stance and alignment is perfect, sometimes standing over the ball for extended periods. Despite not participating in Hector Trophée 2025, Juuso remains an active member of the community.
